Hello world! Website back

My old hosting was provided for free by my good friend Marti. It ran on its own system under a VPS. Neat. Unfortunately  It turned to be not such a good system. Since a couple of week I was having several problems with the memory, speed or performance.

After trying a couple of hosting services I realized that all I need is a basic platform to host my few pages. This webpage aims to support communication with people. On certain few occasions it has thousands of visitor (like when I published on APOD), but normally is just a virtual presentation card.

So, welcome to WordPress.com. It is quite limited and not so customizable, but is reliable, fast and free.

4 July 2009 • Send edit request ?
